system.description:
At 11th level, choose one of the following:

Masters of Surveillance

As an action, designate a number of creatures up to your proficiency bonus within range of your Commanding Presence. You and the creatures you designate gain advantage on Perception and Investigation checks for one hour. Once you have used this ability, you may not use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

Local Facilities

You have an established network of safehouses that you can draw upon. Any time you spend at least a week in a new city, you can establish a Grade 1 or 2 Safe House stronghold in the city at half cost. Any Urban Bolt Hole you purchase is also at half-cost.You can also establish a new Urban Bolt Hole over a number of hours equal to 7 - your proficiency bonus.
